Package org.calypsonet.terminal.calypso.crypto.legacysam.sam

Interface LegacySam

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.calypsonet.terminal.reader.selection.spi.SmartCard
    public interface LegacySam
extends org.calypsonet.terminal.reader.selection.spi.SmartCard
    A static and partial view of the legacy SAM's content.
    Since:
    0.1.0
